key_risks: Regulatory risks due to operations in multiple jurisdictions and reliance on Variable Interest Entities (VIEs)
Market volatility impacting trading volumes and financial performance
Intense competition in the online brokerage industry
Cybersecurity risks related to handling sensitive financial data
controversies: Securities class action lawsuit alleging misrepresentation of compliance with Chinese regulations
Instances of malicious sites imitating Futu’s brand, raising concerns about brand integrity and user security
social_issues: Allegations related to business practices and compliance with regulations
governance_issues: Complex regulatory compliance due to operations in China, Hong Kong, and the U.S.
